Sentencas: Among all designs of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), the most progress has been achieved with the tubular design.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cells for stationary, mobile, and military applications

Sentencas: However, the electrical resistance of tubular SOFCs is high, and specific power output (W/cm(3)) and volumetric power density are (W/cm(3))
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cells for stationary, mobile, and military applications

Sentencas: low These low power densities make tubular SOFCs suitable only for stationary power generation and not very attractive for mobile applications.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cells for stationary, mobile, and military applications

Sentencas: Planar SOFCs, in contrast, are capable of achieving very high power densities.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cells for stationary, mobile, and military applications

Sentencas: Additionally, sizeable cost reductions are possible through a concept called mass customization that is being pursued in the US Department of Energy's Solid State Energy Conversion Alliance (SECA).
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cells for stationary, mobile, and military applications

Sentencas: This concept involves the development of a 3 - 10 kW size core planar SOFC module that can be mass produced and then combined for different size applications in stationary power generation, transportation, and military market sectors, thus eliminating the need to produce custom-designed and inherently more expensive fuel cell stacks to meet a specific power rating.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cells for stationary, mobile, and military applications

Sentencas: This paper discusses the recent work at the Pacific Northwest National Laboratory (PNNL) in support of the design and development of low-cost modular SOFC systems using lower temperature, anode-supported SOFCs.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cells for stationary, mobile, and military applications
